name: Swim Classes: Level 1
description: This class is designed to orient participants to the aquatic environment and to help them gain basic aquatic skills. In addition, participants start learning about how to be safe around water. Registration is limited to one class per participant. Children must be 48" to participate.
fullDescription: This class is designed to orient participants to the aquatic environment and to help them gain basic aquatic skills. In addition, participants start learning about how to be safe around water. Registration is limited to one class per participant. Children must be 48" to participate.
whatTheyOffer: This class is designed to orient participants to the aquatic environment and to help them gain basic aquatic skills. In addition, participants start learning about how to be safe around water. Registration is limited to one class per participant. Children must be 48" to participate.
howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time. For additional questions, please contact the pool directly at (415) 831- 6805.
